thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Marilyn

author: Marilyn
title: Marilyn
text: I have used Rentalcars on a number of occasions in numerous countries. They will always meet the prices of competitors and the post-rental service is excellent. They don't have much control over the service of the providers, but if there are problems, they do their very best to resolve them. In particular, I have had disputes with the hire car companies through their over-charging and Rentalcars have been very persistent in resolving my complaints without me having to battle the hire car company. I also had the experience of a hire car company wanting to charge an enormous amount for a change of nominated driver. I called Rentalcars on the spot and they emailed the company while we waited and fixed the problem. I certainly recommend Rentalcars and will keep giving them my business.
